review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How did it feel to experience a sense of gratitude yesterday? Being on The Path
            doesn’t mean you have all your problems solved. It means you know how to go into a place of balance and take
            care of yourself, as you handle the challenges of life. Be on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Let’s stay on a positive note during this holiday. Focus on something to be happy about. Spend some time
            today with the intention of being happy (Pillar #6)
step_of_the_day.content:
"The purpose of our lives is to be happy." Dalai LamaIt’s easy, especially during this year, to be caught up in problems, fears, worries and, well, just
            “stuff\". During difficult and dangerous times, the tendency is to be on guard and preoccupied by what needs
            to be taken care of. The things that bring us joy and happiness frequently take a back seat. Pillar number 8
            of The Path is flexibility. This means being able to pivot and experience joy, even during a pandemic, or
            economic distress. Finding your life rhythm that gives you sustenance and recovery.

action_step:
Hold the intention today to take time and find ways of experiencing joy and happiness. Living mindfully is
            about awakening from your automatic behavior to notice the moment. When you do this, any moment can be
            experienced joyfully. And when you do this, you are enhancing your ability to be present. Find happiness in
            your life today.
journal_entry:
Write about whether you have been taking time for yourself and restoring the resources of your mind and
            body.
